LanguageData.MineableDestroyed_Disapproved.stages.des: I destroyed a natural wall. It's wrong to scar the world this way.
LanguageData.MineableDestroyed_Horrible.stages.destro: I destroyed a natural wall. It was a horrible violation of nature.
LanguageData.MineableDestroyed_Prohibited.stages.dest: I destroyed a natural wall. What a terrible offense against nature.
LanguageData.Mined_Disapproved.stages.mined.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Disapproved.stages.mined.descripti: I had to mine a hole. I disapprove of harming the earth this way.
LanguageData.Mined_Horrible.stages.mined.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Horrible.stages.mined.description: I had to mine a hole. It was an offense against the earth.
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Disapproved_Mood.stages.mined: Someone mined a hole in the pure earth. It's wrong to scar the world this way.
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Horrible.stages.mined.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.mined.de: Someone mined a hole in the pure earth. It was a horrible violation of nature.
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Prohibited.stages.mined.label: mined
We mined a hole in the pure earth. What a terrible offense against nature.
